channel.title: Thread: [317] qwertyscape™ [317] [508 maps] [eco] [pking] [vote3cash]
channel.description:
mod please delete this ! i need it @ adv section shit~~!!
[CENTER][IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/uc07rum3whe7o9k/nieuwe%20banner.PNG?dl=1[/img]
[SIZE=5][COLOR=#FF0000]START YOUR ADVENTRUE TODAY[/COLOR][/SIZE] [SIZE=5][B][URL=http://"http://qwertyscape.com"]website[/URL][/B][/SIZE] [SIZE=5][B][URL=http://"http://www.qwertyscape.com/webclient.html"]webclient[/URL][/B][/SIZE] [SIZE=5][B][URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/s/m1x2tgnr5hrk0k3/qwertsity.jar?dl=1"]download client[/URL][/B][/SIZE] [SIZE=5][B][URL=http://"http://qwertyscape.com/vote.php"]vote[/URL][/B][/SIZE]
first of all i wanna say im working on this server for like 2months now fixed alot of bugs rewrited alot skils and alot more this is a short list with the things i did[/CENTER]
1. made a better home easy for ppl and helpfull npcs not done yet! 2. made a good donor store and pkp store. 3. made a great donor zone 4. made vote for cash and ::vote command 5. made fightpits giving an reward 6. rewrited combat and death (attack) (strangth) (defence) (magic) (ranged) (lifepoints) (prayer-curses and reggprayers). 7. rewrited firemaking fishing and thiefing. 8. made an full screen better and less laggy! 9. made basket of egs sled ring of easter animted! 10. rewrited summoning
[CENTER]things i gonna ad in the future[/CENTER]
1. wildy ditch fully working 2. fixing all maps 80% done only small bugg @ the G.E. 3. add castlewars fight cave and alot more minigames. 4. and i wanna add all 742 items offhand not for using
[CENTER]some screen shots!!!! first the home! not done yet [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/3koa8dmkjvcr9p8/fullscreenhome.png?dl=1[/img]
the point shop! [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/rl8nqx2kdynbtv2/pointshop.png?dl=1[/img]
some bosses [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/w1cjgl1j6yu383r/bosses.png?dl=1[/img]
fully working summoning! [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/w1cjgl1j6yu383r/bosses.png?dl=1[/img]
minigames! fightpits [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/ykfi8o5boebnfgl/fightpits.png?dl=1[/img]
pest control we got more minigames but need more players online to show so join! [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/t05apqchzz3mkts/pestcontrol.png?dl=1[/img]
donor zone and shops
donor zone! [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/k5g9zs2mo230ns7/donorzone.png?dl=1[/img]
donor point shop and other shop @ donorzone
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/dmom8dxdr08xvzb/donorpointshop.png?dl=1[/img]
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/2fxnr1b9tq03gm1/donroshop.png?dl=1[/img]
and my little youtube vidd! sorry i was bored [video=youtube;aM7rO6Y2hFE]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aM7rO6Y2hFE[/video][/CENTER]

item.description:
@Allen wrote:

pkerrr:

but cmon really can you be that dumb to think “server downloads” is an advertising section honeslty

Have you read his grammar? I wouldn’t doubt it. Some times people miss click. This kind of thing happens on MoparScape all the time. Get over it.
